mapper.select: select interfaceId,sum(allNum) as allNum from userInterfaceinfo group by interfaceId order by allNum desc limit #{limit}

-- 找出这个某个用户的所有接口 select tt.id,tt.name,tt.method,tt.requestParams,tt.getRequestParams,tt.description,tt.uri,tt.host,tt.userId,t.allNum from (select interfaceId,sum(allNum) as allNum from userInterfaceinfo where isDelete = 0 group by interfaceId) t join (select * from interfaceInfo where userId = #{id} and isDelete = 0) tt where t.interfaceId = tt.id order by t.allNum desc limit #{limit}
select i.*,ui.remNum from interfaceInfo i userInterfaceInfo ui where i.id=#{interfaceId} and ui.interfaceId=#{interfaceId} and ui.userId=#{userId}
